Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.util.Transform

  • public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
    Transform. It has position, scale, rotation...
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transform(Vector2 position, Vector2 scale)
      Creates a new Transform with the specified position and scale.
      Transform(Vector2 position, Vector2 scale, Vector2 origin, float rotation)
      Creates a new Transform with the specified position, scale, origin and rotation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transform

        public Transform(Vector2 position,
         Vector2 scale)
        Creates a new Transform with the specified position and scale.
        The default origin is (scale.getX() / 2, scale.getY() / 2).
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        scale - Scale.

      • Transform

        public Transform(Vector2 position,
         Vector2 scale,
         Vector2 origin,
         float rotation)
        Creates a new Transform with the specified position, scale, origin and rotation.
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        scale - Scale.
        origin - Origin (must be a point between (0, 0) and (scale.getX(), scale.getY())).
        rotation - Rotation angle.
